title: Real Estate Website
text: This project was made with goal of having a property listing website, with most of the functionality. A user can delete, sort, and add properties on the admin panel. Complete with a beautiful UI, and a filtering options on the home page.

title: Les Chevres: Art Gallery
text: This project was made in a group of 4. It was made using Vue.js and the goal was to make an art gallery. Where famous artist's aswell as some friends from the college could display thier drawings/sketches/paintings etc. We split the tasks amongst the group and I was responsible for the Login, Register, Admin, Gallery, and Landing pages.

title: Blob Portfolio
text: This project was my first ever portfolio. It was created exclusively with HTML5 and CSS3 about 1 month into the course. I am proud of this project because it was a stepping stone in my journey to becoming a web developer

title: SpaceX Website
text: This was my first group project. We were tasked to make any website we desire and we were split into groups of 5. My team opted for a space exploration theme so that is what we did. We were each responsible for different pages, mine being the Team webpage

title: Ramsay Portfolio
text: This was my second portfolio project since joining the course. I experimented with lots of CSS tricks but in the end it was not very cohesive but I took this opportunity to learn to learn as much as I can. I learnt from all my mistakes, and I hope that my newer projects reflect that.

title: GREECE: Holiday Bookings
text: This was my first ever project. We were tasked to make a website for our dream holiday destination. It was made using the very basics of HTML and CSS.

title: TIMESCHEME App
text: I was tasked to make a To-Do-List webApp. Where a user could add, delete and check off tasks.

title: BMI Calculator
text: I created a Body Mass Index Calculator. It takes a users height and weight(Weight / Height^2) values and outputs a value reflecting your health standing.
